DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to identify genetic causes of adverse events after cardiac surgery, such as atrial fibrillation, myocardial infarction, renal dysfunction and heart failure. Patients undergoing heart surgery at Brigham and Women's Hospital and Texas Heart Institute are eligible to participate.
DOC.brief_title: Identification of Genomic Predictors of Adverse Events After Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study aims to identify genetic causes of adverse events after cardiac surgery, such as atrial fibrillation, myocardial infarction, renal dysfunction and heart failure.
DOC.criteria: Undergoing heart surgery Willing to provide consent Enrolled in a concurrent drug or device trial that precludes concurrent enrollment
